BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Resolution strongly condemning the Trump administration’s ongoing efforts to dismantle federal labor protections, standing in unwavering solidarity with unionization efforts across New York City’s workforce, and affirming the fundamental right of all workers to organize, bargain collectively, and hold free and fair union elections
Items.MatterName: Strongly condemning the Trump administration’s ongoing efforts to dismantle federal labor protections.
